# The best wireless headphones you can buy

Whether you want in-ear, on-ear or totally wireless headphones, these picks
from the GHI are sure to provide a great soundtrack while you work, rest and
play.

[The Good Housekeeping Institute Team](/uk/author/531453/the-good-
housekeeping-institute-team/)

07/02/2019

Good Housekeeping

Wireless headphones mean you can enjoy everything from your favourite album to
the latest podcast episode without having to attach a cable to your phone or
tablet. But with a huge choice in on-ear, in-ear and totally wireless
headphones out there, picking the right pair for you can be a minefield.

**The best wireless headphones  
**[Smartphone](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/g23889694/best-smartphones/) manufacturers from Apple and Google
to Sony and Samsung have ditched the 3.5mm headphone socket on their products,
so there's no doubt that wireless headphones are the future. Prices can start
from as little as £20, but if you want the best sound quality and comfort they
can cost over £200. We've included both the best money can buy and some
cheaper options under £50 on this list.

 **In-ear or on-ear headphones  
**[In-ear headphones](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/g684326/best-bluetooth-in-ear-headphones/) are the most commonly seen
type of headphone. You insert them directly into your ear canal, and they
usually come with a range of silicone ear tips. These earphones are highly
portable and you can find wireless versions with a cable connecting the two
earbuds, a neckband (made of flexible material or hard plastic) and [true
wireless earphones](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/g684571/best-truly-wireless-headphones/) which don't have anything
joining the left and right earbud together. If you find in-ear headphones
uncomfortable, though, [on-ear
headphones](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/g684413/best-on-ear-bluetooth-headphones/) may be a better fit.
These sit on your ears and have pads made of materials like foam or leather
for added comfort.

 **Key features to consider  
** Look for a pair of [noise-cancelling
headphones](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/g23918336/best-noise-cancelling-headphones/) if you'll be
listening in a loud environment such as a busy train or when you’re flying. If
you're buying [headphones for
exercise](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/g25731746/best-exercise-headphones/), sweat and water resistance
are must-have features, along with a cable clip and ear hooks or wings that
keep the headphones secure when you’re moving around.  

Here is our roundup of some of the best wireless headphones from the GHI
tests.

 _We earn a commission for products purchased through some links in this
article._  

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best on-ear wireless headphones

Noise Cancelling Headphones 700

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07Q9MJKBV)

Bose amazon.co.uk

£289.99

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07Q9MJKBV)

**Score: 96/100**

****You'll be hard pushed to do better than these Bose on-ear headphones.
They're comfortable, they sound balanced and they do a fantastic job at
immersing you in your music with excellent noise-cancelling. There are some
great extra features and while they may be expensive, they're worth it if you
want the best headphones.

**Key Specifications**  
Type: On-ear  
Battery life: Up to 20 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Carry case, 3.5mm audio cable, charging cable  
Location of in-line controls: On ear cup

[Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones
700](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-reviews/tech/a28717187/bose-
noise-cancelling-headphones-700-review/)

Runner-up wireless on-ear headphones

Bose QuietComfort 35 Series II

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0756GB78C)

Bose

Bose amazon.co.uk

£225.00

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0756GB78C)

****Score: 94/100****

********These are the best set of on-ear wireless headphones we've tried. As
expected from Bose, the sound quality is excellent, and there's exceptional
noise-cancelling technology built-in to help you concentrate on the music. The
headphones are comfortable to wear too, and give you 20 hours of listening
time.  

**Key Specifications**  
Type: On-ear  
Battery life: Up to 20 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Carry case, 3.5mm cable, charging cable  
Location of in-line controls: On ear cup

[Bose QuietComfort 35 Series II
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-reviews/tech/a685000/bose-
quietcomfort-35-ii/)

Sony WH-1000XM3 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07GDR2LYK)

Sony

Sony amazon.co.uk

£259.00

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07GDR2LYK)

****Score: 93/100****  

These are one of the best pairs of noise-cancelling headphones you can buy.
Not only are they extremely effective at cutting out external sound, but you
can also temporarily let outside noise in by covering the right ear cup with
your hand. They don't come cheap, but they're one of the most comfortable
headphones we've tried.

**Key Specifications  
** Type: On-ear  
Battery life: Up to 30 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Hard shell case, charging cable, 3.5mm audio cable  
Location of in-line controls: On ear cup

[Sony WH-1000XM3 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a27389796/sony-wh-1000xm3-review/)

Best wireless in-ear headphones

Bose Quiet Control 30 in-ear headphones

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/Bose-Quietcontrol-Cancelling-Bluetooth-
Headphones/dp/B01HETFQA8)

Bose

Bose amazon.co.uk

£250.00

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/Bose-Quietcontrol-Cancelling-Bluetooth-
Headphones/dp/B01HETFQA8)

**Score: 92/100**

****Simple and straightforward to set up and use, this pair of Bluetooth
headphones sound great. The noise-cancelling technology blocks out external
sounds and immerses you in the music. It's manually adjustable and you get ten
hours of listening time too. The hard plastic collar-band won't suit
everybody, though.  

******Key Specifications  
** ****Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to 10 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Hard carry case, three different sized silicone ear tips  
Location of in-line controls: On cable

[Bose Quiet Control 30 in-ear headphones
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-reviews/tech/a677684/bose-
quietcontrol-30/)

Runner-up i﻿﻿﻿n-ear wireless headphones

Jabra Elite 65e

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07BHXTJWG)

Jabra

Jabra Amazon

£99.99

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07BHXTJWG)

**Score: 91/100**  

****These are one of the best-sounding pairs of in-ear headphones we've
tested. They provide a good balance of treble and bass, and there's excellent
noise-cancelling technology built-in, to completely immerse you in the music.
As with the Bose in-ear pair, the plastic neckband won't suit everyone.

**Key Specifications  
** Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to 13 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Three different sized silicone ear tips, three different
sized silicone wings, charging cable, soft carry case  
Location of in-line controls: On cable

[Jabra Elite 65e review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a689625/jabra-elite-65e/)

Best totally wireless headphones

Beats Powerbeats Pro

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07RB7YHWH)

Beats by Dre

amazon.co.uk

£213.10

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07RB7YHWH)

**Score: 90/100**

****The Beats Powerbeats Pro are the best pair of totally wireless headphones
we've tested. The sound quality is excellent with punchy bass, they're
comfortable to wear and have the longest battery life of any true wireless
pair we've tried. The £219 price tag may be steep, but we think they're worth
it.  

**Key Specifications  
** ****Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to nine hours  
Noise cancelling: No  
Accessories included: Three sizes of silicone ear tips, charging cable, charge
case  
Location of in-line controls: On ear bud

[Beats Powerbeats Pro review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a28241364/beats-powerbeats-pro-review/)  

Best wireless headphones for personalised sound

Nura Nuraphone

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B076X4KH11/)

Nura

Nura amazon.co.uk

£611.29

[BUY NOW](http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B076X4KH11/)

**Score: 87/100**

****These headphones use measurements taken via an app to create a
personalised sound profile for you. They come with a high price tag and a
unique design that combines an in-ear bud with an on-ear cup. They can be
fiddly to wear, but the impressive sound is worth it.

**Key specifications  
** Type: On-ear  
Battery life: Up to 20 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Magnetic protective case, charging cable  
Location of in-line controls: On ear cup

[Nura Nuraphone review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a683633/nura-nuraphones/)

Best wireless headphones for fitness

Libratone Track+

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07BYZ8934)

Libratone amazon.co.uk

£140.57

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07BYZ8934)

**Score: 89/100**

****These are our winning pair of headphones for sports. The sound quality is
great, and noise-cancelling is built-in too. You can even let the headphones
select the level of noise-cancelling for you, based on the noise they detect,
so you won't be completely unaware of the world around you.  

**Key Specifications  
** Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to 8 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Three-different shaped silicone ear tips, two pairs of
wings  
Location of in-line controls: On cable

[Libratone Track+ review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a689370/libratone-track/)

Best cheap wireless on-ear headphones

Mixcder E7 wireless headphones

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B077TRXYCN)

Mixcder amazon.co.uk

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B077TRXYCN)

**Score: 87/100**

****This pair of affordable on-ear headphones doesn't compromise on sound.
There's a lot of detail, with thumping bass and clear high notes. The built-in
noise-cancelling cuts out some (but not all) surrounding noise. They're bulky,
but you'll get up to 18 hours of listening time.  

******Key Specifications  
** ****Type: On-ear  
Battery life: Up to 18 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Hard shell carry case, 3.5mm cable, charging cable  
Location of in-line controls: On ear cup

[Mixcder E7 wireless headphones
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a689358/mixcder-e7/)

Best wireless headphones for battery life

Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B01LW0M4J1)

Beats amazon.co.uk

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B01LW0M4J1)

**Score: 88/100**

****The long battery life is the standout feature of this pair. They offer a
whopping 40 hours of listening time. And when the battery is low, a quick
five-minute charge will give you three hours of life. They also have an
impressive sound that has a rounded bass and plenty of detail in the treble.  

**Key Specifications  
** Type: On-ear  
Battery life: Up to 40 hours  
Noise cancelling: Yes  
Accessories included: Soft case, remote talk cable, carabiner clip, charging
cable  
Location of in-line controls: On ear cup

[Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a689356/beats-solo3-wireless/)  

Best cheap wireless in-ear headphones

Sony WI-C300 Wireless In-Ear Headphones

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B078VGMLNL)

Otsuki, Marina (SGMO)

Sony amazon.co.uk

£20.95

[BUY NOW](https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B078VGMLNL)

**Score: 85/100**

****This affordable pair of in-ear wireless headphones doesn't compromise on
sound. Whether you love classical or drum and bass, the audio is balanced.
They offer eight hours of listening time – impressive for a pair at this price
point.  

**Key Specifications  
** Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to eight hours  
Noise cancelling: No  
Accessories included: Three sizes of silicone ear tips, charging cable  
Location of in-line controls: On cable

[Sony WI-C300 Wireless In-Ear Headphones
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a26421650/sony-wi-c300-review/)

Best cheap wireless headphones for fitness

Goji GSFINBT18 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](https://www.currys.co.uk/gbuk/audio-and-
headphones/headphones/headphones/goji-gsfinbt18-wireless-bluetooth-headphones-
black-green-10174710-pdt.html)

Currys

Goji currys.co.uk

£19.97

[BUY NOW](https://www.currys.co.uk/gbuk/audio-and-
headphones/headphones/headphones/goji-gsfinbt18-wireless-bluetooth-headphones-
black-green-10174710-pdt.html)

**Score: 78/100**

****This is the pair of sports headphones we'd recommend if you're on a
budget. The sound quality is good and they're comfortable to wear for a long
time too. The winged ear tips mean the fit of the earphones is secure too.
You'll get five hours of listening time from one full charge. We did find that
your music can be heard by those around you, though.

**Key Specifications  
** Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to five hours  
Noise cancelling: No  
Accessories included: Three sets of ear tips and wings, soft pouch  
Location of in-line controls: On cable

[Goji GSFINBT18 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a25389552/goji-sport-gsfinbt18-headphones-review/)  

Best cheap totally wireless headphones

JLAB Audio JBuds Air

[
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
](http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07HGL3J31/)

JLAB

JLAB amazon.co.uk

£49.99

[BUY NOW](http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07HGL3J31/)

**Score: 74/100**

****We recommend this pair of true wireless headphones if you're on a limited
budget. They sound good with a clear and defined treble, although the bass
does lack punch. You'll only get four hours of listening time, but the
charging case can extend this by 10 hours and makes this pair great value for
money.  

**Key Specifications  
** Type: In-ear  
Battery life: Up to four hours  
Noise cancelling: No  
Accessories included: Three different sized silicone tips, one pair of rubber
JLab Cush Fins, charging case  
Location of in-line controls: On ear-bud

[JLAB Audio JBuds Air review](https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/uk/product-
reviews/tech/a26892956/jlab-audio-jbuds-air-review/)
